game.title: Interstellar: The Pixel Odyssey
game.summary: Embark on a pixelated journey as Cooper, piloting the Endurance through a wormhole to explore distant planets, solve puzzles, and navigate time-space distortions to save humanity from extinction.
game.world_setting: In a pixelated 2D world, Earth is plagued by crop blight and dust storms, pushing humanity's survival to the brink. Explore Miller's water world with extreme time dilation, Dr. Mann's icy planet, and Edmunds' potentially habitable world. Encounter TARS and CASE robots, and communicate with the fifth-dimensional tesseract to unravel the mysteries of gravity and time.

main_character.name: Cooper
main_character.visual_description: Wearing a pixelated space suit with a helmet and oxygen tank, Cooper carries a digital watch displaying Earth's time.

characters.name: Professor Brand
characters.visual_description: Wearing a lab coat and glasses, with a NASA emblem on his chest.

characters.name: Amelia Brand
characters.visual_description: Donned in a spacesuit with a communicator in hand.

characters.name: Miller
characters.visual_description: Clad in a diving suit with a distressed expression.

characters.name: Dr. Mann
characters.visual_description: In an astronaut suit, looking stern and calculating.

characters.name: TARS
characters.visual_description: A blocky robot with multiple manipulator arms.

characters.name: CASE
characters.visual_description: A compact robot with advanced technological features.

skills.name: Gravity Manipulation
skills.effect: Allows Cooper to manipulate gravity for navigation and puzzle-solving.

skills.name: Wormhole Navigation
skills.effect: Enhances Cooper's ability to navigate through the wormhole for faster travel.

skills.name: Time-Space Distortion Awareness
skills.effect: Increases Cooper's awareness of time-space distortions for better decision-making.

skills.name: Planetary Survival
skills.effect: Improves Cooper's survival skills on different planets with varying environments.

skills.name: Alien Communication
skills.effect: Allows Cooper to communicate with alien life forms for information and assistance.

skills.name: Time Dilation Mastery
skills.effect: Masters the use of time dilation for strategic advantage in combat and exploration.

skills.name: Robotic Assistance
skills.effect: Utilizes TARS and CASE robots for combat support and problem-solving.

skills.name: Robot Upgrades
skills.effect: Enhances the capabilities of TARS and CASE robots for improved performance.

skills.name: Robot Teamwork
skills.effect: Enhances coordination between Cooper and the robots for seamless teamwork.

skills.name: Gravity Interaction
skills.effect: Utilizes gravity interaction for communication and problem-solving in different dimensions.

skills.name: Temporal Insights
skills.effect: Gains insights into the nature of time for strategic decision-making.

skills.name: Dimensional Connection
skills.effect: Establishes a strong connection across dimensions for effective communication and problem-solving.

weapons.name: Gravity Gauntlet
weapons.description: A high-tech gauntlet that allows the user to manipulate gravity in a limited area. Can be used to create gravitational traps or repel enemies.

weapons.name: Wormhole Blade
weapons.description: A futuristic sword infused with wormhole energy, capable of slicing through space-time rifts. Can be used for quick traversal or combat.

weapons.name: Time Dilation Bow
weapons.description: A bow that harnesses the power of time dilation to slow down or speed up time for the target. Ideal for precise strikes and control over combat situations.

cutscenes.title: The Gravity Equation
cutscenes.description: Cooper communicates with Murph through the fifth-dimensional tesseract, guiding her to solve the gravity equation to save humanity.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: Murph, listen to me carefully. You have to find the equation. It's the key to our survival.

dialogue.speaker: Murph
dialogue.line: Dad, I don't understand. How can I do this?

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: Trust in the connection we share. Look beyond time and space. You can do this, Murph.

cutscenes.title: The Decision Point
cutscenes.description: Cooper must make a critical decision at Cooper Station, choosing between staying with his family or embarking on a mission to find Amelia on Edmunds' world.

dialogue.speaker: Amelia Brand
dialogue.line: Cooper, we need to go after Edmunds. He might be the key to our future.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: But what about my family? I promised them I'd come back.

dialogue.speaker: TARS
dialogue.line: Cooper, sometimes survival means making sacrifices. Trust in your instincts.

cutscenes.title: The Journey Ahead
cutscenes.description: Cooper sets course for Edmunds' potentially habitable world, facing unknown dangers and challenges in the vastness of space.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: We're heading towards a new beginning. Whatever lies ahead, we'll face it together.

dialogue.speaker: CASE
dialogue.line: Acknowledged. Ready to assist in navigation and exploration.

dialogue.speaker: Amelia Brand
dialogue.line: I believe Edmunds holds the key to our destiny. We must find him.
